changelog.change_log:
- Home Run Derby mode has launched!
- Fixed some edge cases where users could get stuck on the splash screen. Thank you to the community users who have provided details and have worked with our development team directly.
- Quality of Life (QOL) You can now see your Voice Respect Score report from in-game.
- Fixed some cases where certain setting would cause self-mannequin to flicker.
- QOL you can now easily see which items are equipped by a visual checkmark/white border around the item.
- Ranked Matches now require a player to be at least level 10
- MMR Ranks are now shown on the Ranked Screen.
- Some items in-game had their art updated.
- Voice Respect Scores have launched! See in you game report card
- Enhanced the equipping ability to easily see which items are equipped to your character.

Many have been asking for a baseball game mode, it's officially here. Home Run Derby! Can you hit a homerun?
    
More content to follow later
+ Updated: Our biggest avatars and clothing upgrade ever Character Customization V4. More improvements will be released at every update as each item is updated.
    + Shirtless, highly requested player request
    + Bald head
    + Improved performance with better graphics yes we did both!
+ Updated: Park Visuals, more work is being done here for future updates!
+ Major changes to behind the scene systems and improvements which allow for possibility of friends list and other feature player improvements.
+ Discord Verification has returned from its vacation!
+ AR (also known has passthrough) mode has moved to Fitness zone

Fixed
+ Fixed a bug where bundled items would require a restart for the item(s) to show up in the user's locker. Thank you to all the Ballers! that worked with us on narrowing down this pesky bug!
+ Fixed various collisions and rare crashes
+ Team colors not working on some avatars

Coming Soon
+ Even more clothing and avatar upgrades

Coming Later
+ New items for you to spend your B-Bucks on!
+ New bundles
+ More items to be updated to CharV4, we looking at you Swat Mask
